trans-unit.source: 2007 - 2019, Victor Blomqvist - vb@viblo.se, MIT License
trans-unit.target: 2007 - 2019, Victor Blomqvist - vb@viblo.se, MIT License

trans-unit.source: “Pythonic” - It should not be visible that a c-library (chipmunk) is in the bottom, it should feel like a Python library (no strange naming, OO, no memory handling and more)
trans-unit.target: “Pythonic” - It should not be visible that a c-library (chipmunk) is in the bottom, it should feel like a Python library (no strange naming, OO, no memory handling and more)

trans-unit.source: E-Mail
trans-unit.target: E-Mail

trans-unit.source: Easy to use - It should be easy to use, no complicated stuff should be needed to add physics to your game/program.
trans-unit.target: Easy to use - It should be easy to use, no complicated stuff should be needed to add physics to your game/program.

trans-unit.source: Homepage
trans-unit.target: Homepage

trans-unit.source: Issue Tracker
trans-unit.target: Issue Tracker

trans-unit.source: Multi-platform - Should work on both Windows, *nix and OSX.
trans-unit.target: Multi-platform - Should work on both Windows, *nix and OSX.

trans-unit.source: Non-intrusive - It should not put restrictions on how you structure your program and not force you to use a special game loop, it should be possible to use with other libraries like Pygame and Pyglet.
trans-unit.target: Non-intrusive - It should not put restrictions on how you structure your program and not force you to use a special game loop, it should be possible to use with other libraries like Pygame and Pyglet.

trans-unit.source: Simple to build & install - You shouldn’t need to have a zillion of libraries installed to make it install, or do a lot of command line tricks.
trans-unit.target: Simple to build & install - You shouldn’t need to have a zillion of libraries installed to make it install, or do a lot of command line tricks.

trans-unit.source: Stackoverflow
trans-unit.target: Stackoverflow

trans-unit.source: Basically Pymunk have been made to be as easy to install and distribute as possible, usually
trans-unit.target: 基本上,Pymunk已经被制作成尽可能简单的安装和分发,通常是

trans-unit.source: CFFI (will be installed automatically by Pip)
trans-unit.target: CFFI(将由Pip自动安装)

trans-unit.source: Chipmunk (Compiled library already included on common platforms)
trans-unit.target: Chipmunk (已包含在通用平台上的编译库)

trans-unit.source: Chipmunk Compilation
trans-unit.target: 花栗鼠汇编

trans-unit.source: Contact & Support
trans-unit.target: Contact & Support

trans-unit.source: Dependencies / Requirements
trans-unit.target: 依赖性/要求

trans-unit.source: Documentation
trans-unit.target: 文件资料

trans-unit.source: Example
trans-unit.target: 例子

trans-unit.source: Examples are not included if you install with
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用

trans-unit.source: For more detailed and advanced examples, take a look at the included demos (in examples/).
trans-unit.target: 关于更详细和更高级的例子,请看包含的demo(在examples/)。

trans-unit.source: GCC and friends (optional, you need it to compile Chipmunk)
trans-unit.target: GCC和朋友(可选,你需要它来编译Chipmunk)。

trans-unit.source: In the normal case pymunk can be installed with pip:
trans-unit.target: 正常情况下,pymunk可以用pip安装。

trans-unit.source: Installation
trans-unit.target: 安装

trans-unit.source: It has one direct dependency, CFFI.
trans-unit.target: 它有一个直接的依赖关系,即CFFI。

trans-unit.source: It is (or is striving to be):
trans-unit.target: 它是(或正在努力成为)。

trans-unit.source: Matplotlib & Jupyter Notebook (optional, you need it to run the Matplotlib based demos)
trans-unit.target: Matplotlib & Jupyter Notebook (optional, you need it to run the Matplotlib based demos)

trans-unit.source: Note that chipmunk is actually not built as a python extension, but distutils / setuptools doesn’t currently handle pure native libraries that needs to be built in a good way if built with build_clib.
trans-unit.target: Note that chipmunk is actually not built as a python extension, but distutils / setuptools doesn’t currently handle pure native libraries that needs to be built in a good way if built with build_clib.

trans-unit.source: Or if you have the source unpacked / you got Pymunk by cloning its git repo, you can explicitly tell Pymunk to compile it inplace:
trans-unit.target: 或者如果你已经解压了源码/你通过克隆它的git repo得到了Pymunk,你可以明确告诉Pymunk在原地编译。

trans-unit.source: Please use the issue tracker at github to report any issues you find: https://github.com/viblo/pymunk/issues
trans-unit.target: Please use the issue tracker at github to report any issues you find: https://github.com/viblo/pymunk/issues

trans-unit.source: Pygame (optional, you need it to run the Pygame based demos)
trans-unit.target: Pygame (可选,你需要它来运行基于Pygame的演示)

trans-unit.source: Pyglet (optional, you need it to run the Pyglet based demos)
trans-unit.target: Pyglet (可选,你需要它来运行基于Pyglet的演示)

trans-unit.source: Pymunk can also be installed with conda, from the conda-forge channel:
trans-unit.target: Pymunk也可以和conda一起安装,从conda-forge频道。

trans-unit.source: Pymunk has been tested and runs fine on both Python 2 and Python 3. It has been tested on recent versions of CPython (2 and 3) and Pypy. For an exact list of tested versions see the Travis and Appveyor test configs.
trans-unit.target: Pymunk已经在Python 2和Python 3上测试并运行良好。它已经在CPython (2和3)和Pypy的最新版本上进行了测试。关于测试版本的确切列表,请参见Travis和Appveyor测试配置。

trans-unit.source: Pymunk has been used with success in many projects, big and small. For example: 3 Pyweek game competition winners, more than a dozen published scientific papers and even in a self-driving car simulation! See the Showcases section on the Pymunk webpage for some examples.
trans-unit.target: Pymunk在很多大大小小的项目中都得到了成功的应用。比如 3个Pyweek游戏大赛的冠军,十几篇科学论文的发表,甚至在自动驾驶汽车的模拟中也有应用。请看Pymunk网页上的 "展示案例 "部分,了解一些例子。

trans-unit.source: Pymunk is a easy-to-use pythonic 2d physics library
trans-unit.target: Pymunk是一个简单易用的pythonic二维物理库。

trans-unit.source: Pymunk is a easy-to-use pythonic 2d physics library that can be used whenever you need 2d rigid body physics from Python. Perfect when you need 2d physics in your game, demo or other application! It is built on top of the very capable 2d physics library Chipmunk.
trans-unit.target: Pymunk is a easy-to-use pythonic 2d physics library that can be used whenever you need 2d rigid body physics from Python. Perfect when you need 2d physics in your game, demo or other application! It is built on top of the very capable 2d physics library Chipmunk.

trans-unit.source: Pymunk is built on top of the c library Chipmunk. It uses CFFI to interface with the Chipmunk library file. Because of this Chipmunk has to be compiled before it can be used with Pymunk. Compilation has to be done with GCC or another compiler that uses the same flags.
trans-unit.target: Pymunk是建立在c库Chipmunk之上的,它使用CFFI与Chipmunk库文件接口。它使用CFFI与Chipmunk库文件接口。正因为如此,Chipmunk在被Pymunk使用之前必须先编译。编译必须用GCC或其他使用相同标志的编译器来完成。

trans-unit.source: Python (Runs on CPython 2.7 and 3.X. Pypy and Pypy3)
trans-unit.target: Python (运行在 CPython 2.7 和 3.X.Pypy 和 Pypy3 上)

trans-unit.source: Python 2 & Python 3
trans-unit.target: Python 2 & Python 3

trans-unit.source: Quick code example:
trans-unit.target: 快速代码示例。

trans-unit.source: Regardless of the method you use I will try to answer your questions as soon as I see them. (And if you ask on SO or the forum other people might help as well!)
trans-unit.target: 不管你用什么方法,只要我看到你的问题,我都会尽量回答你。(如果你在SO或论坛上问,其他的人可能也会帮助你!)

trans-unit.source: Setuptools (should be included with Pip)
trans-unit.target: 设置工具(应该包含在Pip中)

trans-unit.source: Sphinx (optional, you need it to build documentation)
trans-unit.target: Sphinx (可选,你需要它来构建文档)

trans-unit.source: The Pymunk Vision
trans-unit.target: 皮蒙克的愿景

trans-unit.source: The compiled file goes into the /pymunk folder (same as space.py, body.py and others).
trans-unit.target: 编译后的文件会进入/pymunk文件夹(和space.py、body.py等一样)。

trans-unit.source: The first version was released in 2007 and Pymunk is still actively developed and maintained today.
trans-unit.target: 第一个版本于2007年发布,Pymunk至今仍在积极开发和维护。

trans-unit.source: The source distribution does not include a pre-compiled Chipmunk library file, instead you need to build it yourself.
trans-unit.target: 源码发行版不包含一个预编译的Chipmunk库文件,你需要自己构建它。

trans-unit.source: The source distribution of Pymunk ships with a number of demos in the examples directory, and it also contains the full documentation including API reference.
trans-unit.target: Pymunk的源码发行版在examples目录下附带了一些demo,它还包含了完整的文档,包括API参考。

trans-unit.source: There are basically two options, either building it automatically as part of installation using for example Pip:
trans-unit.target: 基本上有两种选择,一是使用例如Pip自动构建作为安装的一部分。

trans-unit.source: This release is based on the latest Pymunk release (5.6.0), using Chipmunk 7.0.2 rev aef346fb8b (source included)
trans-unit.target: 这个版本基于最新的Pymunk版本(5.6.0),使用Chipmunk 7.0.2 rev aef346fb8b(包含源代码)

trans-unit.source: This section is only required in case you dont install pymunk the normal way (
trans-unit.target: 这一部分只在你没有按照正常方式安装pymunk的情况下才需要。

trans-unit.source: You can also find the full documentation including examples and API reference on the Pymunk homepage, http://www.pymunk.org
trans-unit.target: You can also find the full documentation including examples and API reference on the Pymunk homepage, http://www.pymunk.org

trans-unit.source: You can ask questions/browse old ones at Stackoverflow, just look for the Pymunk tag. http://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/pymunk
trans-unit.target: You can ask questions/browse old ones at Stackoverflow, just look for the Pymunk tag. http://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/pymunk

trans-unit.source: You can email me directly at vb@viblo.se
trans-unit.target: You can email me directly at vb@viblo.se

trans-unit.source: or
trans-unit.target: 或者

trans-unit.source: pip install
trans-unit.target: pip安装

trans-unit.source: pip install pymunk
trans-unit.target: pip install pymunk

trans-unit.source: setup.py install
trans-unit.target: setup.py 安装

trans-unit.source: will take care of everything for you.
trans-unit.target: 会为你打理好一切。
